name: Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wraps
preparation: Dice bell peppers and place in a large bowl. Mix in seasoning, ground pork, water, oil, and soy sauce.

In Multipurpose Steamer, evenly crumble in meat mixture. Cover; cook on high 5–6 min or until meat is cooked through. Use Ground Meat Separator to break up chunks halfway through cooking. Drain off any excess liquid.
To assemble, make eight sets of two stacked lettuce leaves. Top each stack with about 1⁄2 cup filling. Drizzle with toppings, if desired.
tips: Prefer to make the filling on the stovetop? In Wok or Sauté Pan, heat 1 tsp oil over medium-high heat. Add mixture; stir-fry until meat is cooked through, about 5 min.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wrap Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: While those restaurant lettuce wraps you enjoy are delicious, they also come with a hefty dose of calories and sodium and a high price tag! We created Crispy & Crunchy Lettuce Wraps to solve that problem! Packed with notes of garlic and ginger, with a touch of heat, mix this tasty low-sodium blend with the protein of your choice and pile it on crispy lettuce leaves for a meal that clocks in at around $3/serving.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.
